title: Bug 108822 - More efficient logic required for disk sorting when there is a boundary value for row value
OB: When sorting data on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process only less than 40000 rows, the following operation is performed:
EB: Bug 108822 - More efficient logic is required for disk sorting when there is a boundary value for row value. The file should be directly sorted in memory and then written to disk.
